column12: Check module has a 4-pin connection: GND, VCC, SDA, SCK and uses SSD1306 controller.
These foot pedals are simple on/off switches. Speed controller foot pedals with a potentiometer will not work.

column9: FTDI FT232RL USB to 5V TTL Serial
